value:
Your realm is goodness itself. That
rekindles my faith in people. Courtly
intrigue had...smothered it somewhat.

Any nonsense you've heard about
my prowess is spread by those who
want to bring fame to my family.

I feel you are always coming
to my aid. And so I thank you,
$Nu.

I come from a noble family. They
have no prowess at anything save
intrigue. They are despicable filth.

True aim comes from a strong
heart that doesn't waver in the
face of obstacles. How's yours?

It's a pleasure to meet you.$k$pI come with greetings from
$Nf!

I wasn't expecting this! A happy
miscalculation, to be sure.
Hmm. This seems about right...
Well...er... Unfortunate.

I must meet your obviously high
expectations of me!

I'm Jeorge, an Archanean archer.
I'm not sure if I have anything to
offer you, but you have my aid.

You've heard tales of me? Well, it's
not as if I was trying to keep my
life secret, I suppose.$k$pTrue or not, rumors spread like
wildfires. There's no point in trying
to correct or refute them.$k$pIt's refreshing to speak so frankly.
It's wonderful that everyone here
trusts each other so implicitly.$k$pBeing in such company agrees with
me very much. Thank you for
bringing me here.$k$pI do believe I shall stick around,
if you don't mind.
はっ！
ふっ！
うああっ！
I misread you...
I won't miss, I'm afraid.
Sorry about this.
This will be painless.
Just as I calculated...
Off...target.
Heh...
Curious about me? What would you like to know?
I wasn't expecting you to just walk up and start chatting with me.
The only thing noble about me is my much-vaunted lineage.
I am supposedly the best archer on the continent.
I can't seem to get a read on you.
Are you just being calculating? Or am I?
If I said I'd taken an interest in you...would you believe me?
All right.
What's next?
Of course.
